description: I can be shy at first but once you get to know me you'll see I'm just a nice person with laid back attitude who enjoys the little things in life. I have a passion for books. I love movies - on Friday with my family. I am a bit of a couch potato, love to stay home and read, watch movies, or make something with my hands... And I like the sea. It's my crush) If it sounds to you like we have enough interests in common, drop me a line and perhaps we can get together one day.
